item.title: RIP Piyush
item.dc:creator: punchagan
item.description:
I just came across the news that Piyush Vaghela and Nilesh Solanki, fellow Ultimate players, lost their lives, struck by a lightning during a practice session! My deepest condolonces to their near and dear ones.

I met Piyush at the Surat Ultimate Open and enjoyed playing against him. We marked each other on quite a few points, in the game that was my first game in a tournament. He played hard, and pushed his team harder! I vividly remember him commending me on running hard and catching well. I later chatted with him, and was quite impressed with the work he was doing and his dream to give the kids a platform to get greater exposure, through the sport! Silent Voice will surely miss him.

Piyush, may your soul rest in peace! :'(
